name: Rhonnie Graham
text: great service, they took my weedy lawn and turned it into an lush green happy lawn! very happy with this service.

name: Janese Bullard
text: They green doctor has my yard looking great. We have been using them for about a year now and I would recommend. They are always nice and quick to address any concerns.

name: Courtney Meredith
text: The Green Doctor is always reliable and timely for keeping up the health of my lawn. I've been using them for going on 9 years and my lawn is one of the most beautiful in my subdivision. Highly recommend them, you'll be satisfied.

name: Libby Hobson
text: I have had a very favorable experience with the Green Dr's service. They are always prompt in responding to any questions, on time for appointments, polite and pleasant when talking to them, their prices are reasonable and my lawn looks good. I would post a picture but the winter isn't a good representation of how it looks.

name: Staci Taylor
text: The Green Doctor has serviced our lawn for over 3 years.  Their employees and courteous and professional.  The results speak for themselves.  We are very please with how green and lush they keep out lawn.  Very satisfied customer here.

name: Amanda Ballance
text: We started using Green Doctor July 2017,once we moved into our new home with front sod yard. We have been pleased so far with reliable service & weed control. Looking forward to trying the pest services available such as ant & mosquito control.

name: Robert Smith
text: We have been a customer of Green Doctor for 3 years.  The owner and the techs are helpful and always very personable.  Since our first application, in February of 2015, we have been awarded the neighborhood yard of the month two different times.  Thanks so much Green Doctor team!!!!  Your help and dedication have help to make our lawn beautiful!!!

name: Yvette Smith
text: Matt Sales, Manager and Tech initially came out to my property to give me a quote.  I showed him the right side and I showed him the left side (where’re there’re a walkway). Up until this point they’ve been only spraying supposedly the front. I just got off the phone with him today and he explained to me that he did not know to spray the right, pre emergent was done poorly by another provider and to need to wait 3-4 weeks in between treatments (3rd treatment no results).  By far this is one of the worst interactions that I’ve had with the Lawn Service company in a very long time. Poor customer service poor management and poor technician.

name: Jan Love
text: I have used the Green Doctor for my lawn service for several years now.  I have always received excellent service and great results.  My yard looks much better now than it did with previous lawn service companies.  I highly recommend their services!

name: Gloria Sample
text: We have been a long time customer of Green Doctor.   They are professional in their service and very knowledgeable and helpful in the care of lawn needs.   The technicians are always courteous and thorough in the application of chemicals. One thing that is important to me is that they are willing to answer my questions concerning our lawn.

name: R. Kyle Hannah
text: Lawn looks great. Always professional, they take the time to answer your questions.  Highly recommend!

name: Terry Walker
text: Excellent service from The Green Doctor! I have their lawn and pest care services and I'm very PLEASED with the results from both. The technicians are friendly and are quick to respond to any issues I may have. My yard was terrible and full of weeds and they were able to completely fix it in no time.

name: Laura Hemrick
text: There is no doubt in my mind that when it comes to great reliable hometown service for your lawn needs Green Doctor is the best around. In the past I have used another and wonder why I didn't which to Green Doctor soon. From owner to office staff to field tech they always have a positive outlook.

name: Tawanna Hutton
text: I would like to take a moment to say I have never been more pleased with the Pest Control service that The Green Doctor has given. I was paying a lot more for the same service. I have been treated so well even when I needed a return visit for anything. I see the signs all over town in the yards and I must say they look amazing! I would recommend anyone looking for the services they offer.

name: Ken Taylor
text: I've been a customer of the Green Doctor for over 2 years now.  They've offered superior service with superior lawn product.  Their customer service department is prompt and friendly and the lawn care experts who service my yard are always professional and courteous.  Very satisfied customer.

resp.text: Thank you very much we hope we always keep your family happy with our services!

name: tommie gamble
text: I started using Green Doctor at my mother's recommendation. We've been using them for years and have never had a single issue. (And in this day and time, that's AMAZING!)

name: Brett Moore
text: We've been using The Green Doctor in Springville for Pest Control for 2 years and the service has been great!  We chose the quarterly treatment and haven't had an issue with any pests!  The Green Doctor always call beforehand to let us know they're coming and they've been very easy to do business with.  We highly recommend The Green Doctor!

name: Sharon Richards
text: A wonderful company to do business with!  Been using them for years.  They are punctual, my lawn stays weed-free, and their Customer Service is great!

resp.text: Thank you very much we hope we always keep your family happy with our services!

name: Lisa Wester
text: Excellent service. I have three types of grass in different areas of my yard. They treat each one and my lawn looks better than it ever has. Always on time and they let me know when my zoysia needs thatching! Fantastic service, highly recommend!!

name: Adam Boyd
text: Ever since the owner passed away the services have really gone down hill. Due to the owner's passing, the termite bond we had was transferred to Alabama Pest Control who is terrible to work with. Customer service is NOT APC strong point at all. Green Doctor lawn service could use improvement. I had them come do repeat visits on multiple occasions. I paid Green Doctor to take care of my lawn and keep the weeds out but I found myself having to always follow up and get them to come back out for some reason or another. The Green Doctor tech were super friendly when I did speak with them but its like none of them are on the same page.

name: June Cherry
text: We have been using the Green Doctor since we moved to Oneonta and have had several applications applied to our lawn without any problems. We also had them aerate our lawn earlier this year. We also have had a treatment to kill grubs that so far has been working to keep armadillos out of our yard. I would highly recommend this company for others to use.

name: Kelly Bryant
text: I began using Green Doctor because I was envious of my neighbors yard and they use Green Doctor.    I could tell the difference after the first treatment.  I only got in a couple of treatments before winter but they have continued to treat the lawn and I can't wait to see how it looks in the spring.

resp.text: Thank you very much we hope we always keep your family happy with our services! Remember we do pest, termite, and mosquito as well if you need us for that!

name: Mike Box
text: We have the pest control service from the The Green Doctor. Absolutely love the results. We have seen no bugs at all in the house since the service started. We used to have a contract with Cook's and we constantly still had bug problems. Namely ants. We continually had to have them come out between normal intervals to get retreated. Since we have been with The Green Doctor everything is great. Strongly recommend!

name: Tawanna Hutton
text: I would like to take a moment to say I have never been more pleased with the Pest Control service that The Green Doctor has given. I was paying a lot more for the same service. I have been treated so well even when I needed a return visit for anything. I see the signs all over town in the yards and I must say they look amazing! I would recommend anyone looking for the services they offer.

name: Steven Seahorn
text: I had used the Green Doctor for several years and then decided I could pull weeds and so I bought products from the store. I was pseudo-consistent but the problem would come back (generally worse) in the areas I had treated.  I then went to "Americas #1 rated lawncare company."  They did an ok job but I wasn't satisfied.  If you want the best results then stick with Green Doctor.  I'm back on board and I look forward to seeing my lawn by the end of the summer and every summer after.

name: sylvia posey
text: THE GREEN DOCTOR has taken care of my lawn for almost three years. I have used other lawn care companies but was never satisfied!!  WithTHE GREEN DOCTOR I am happy and satisfied! They make sure it gets what it needs for every season. THE GREEN DOCTOR pays attention and they are right on point with diagnosis and treatment of a problem before the damage is done. They are helpful in answering any questions I have. I finally have the lawn I always wanted and I highly recommend THE GREEN DOCTOR to anyone who wants a beautiful, healthy lawn,,,,,😄

name: Trey Miller
text: The grass and flower beds have never looked better. So glad I used The Green Doctor. They are fantastic to deal with. My neighbors are jealous and my lawn is def the talk of the neighborhood.

name: Chris Conner
text: Joseph not only knows his stuff when it comes to pest control, but he is also one of the most passionate and incredible people I've met.  I would recommend him and his work to anyone, Green Doctor is an excellent company.

name: G Vinson
text: We have been using this lawn service for many years and they have always done a great job. They are a very dependable and professional company.

name: Trey Miller

text: Good folks to deal with, Professional and knowledgeable..  We have used several different services through the years with mixed results.  We will continue to do business with Green Doctor!

name: doyle mccay
text: My family has used both lawncare and pest control services.  We love them both.  All the employees we have met are very professional and friendly. I recommend the services to my friends and family.

name: Sharlene Monforton
text: I have used Green Doctor for lawn service and tree/shrub service since Spring of 2017 and have been very pleased with the effect of the service as well as ease of communication.  At the end of summer, my grass was thick and lush, despite not having been watered during the drought of 2016 before we owned the property.  I love the fact that when I call with a question, I talk with a local staff member that has direct access to my account and can give me a timely response and if necessary, the technician called me back to answer my specific yard questions.  Highly recommend!

name: June Cherry
text: We have been using the Green Doctor since we moved to Oneonta and have had several applications applied to our lawn without any problems. We also had them aerate our lawn earlier this year. resp.text: Thank you very much we hope we always keep your family happy with our services! Remember we do pest, termite, and mosquito as well if you need us for that!

name: David Yoon
text:
(Translated by Google) My lawn was damaged.
Then they only ask for money.
My whole lawn was messed up everywhere.
Poor customer service poor management and poor technician.

This place only asks for money and the service is a mess.
I don't know what kind of lawn my lawn currently has.
I never recommend it.

(Original)
My lawn was damaged.
Then they only ask for money.
My whole lawn was messed up everywhere.

이곳은 돈만 요구하고 서비스가 엉망이다.
현재 나의 잔디가 어떤 잔디가 깔려 있는지도 모른다.
절대 추천하지 않는다.

name: Kristy Reynolds
text: Gerald is so nice!  He’s the best.  Remembers what I need each time he does the pest control.  Please do whatever you can to keep this outstanding employee!

resp.text: Hi Kristy! Thank you for sharing your experience with Bama Exterminating. Gerald is an awesome Pest Specialists and I am so happy you enjoyed working with him. We will do everything in our power to keep him around and happy!  I can't wait to share your feedback Gerald  and the team! We really do appreciate your business. Please don't hesitate to let us know if we can be of service.

name: Kim Anderson
text: Bama Exterminating did general, quarterly exterior spraying for pest control at my house for many years.  I thought it was a good price for the service.  The only roaches I ever saw were dead.  Their technicians were especially helpful about answering any questions I had and addressing specific concerns when they came up.  They taught me to identify a brown recluse spider and gave me glue traps for mice.  They were always respectful.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 star review and kind words, Kim! We are thrilled to know that you had an incredible experience with our team and you're seeing great results! Our goal is to make pest control as simple as possible for our customers because we understand how busy life can be. We appreciate your business. Thank you for choosing Bama Exterminating! Please don't hesitate to let us know if we can be of service.

name: Steve Cory
text:
Salton from Bama exterminating knocked on the door today and I asked him to come inside since it was so hot.
I had my inspector Gadget magnifing glass trying to find the heating instructions for a  tv dinner. Dalton help me find the instuctions and even programmed the microwave oven.
3 years ago i had a stroke that left me almost blind.  Dalton's Kindness and willingness to help made my day.  Bama Exterminating is a top shelf business with top shelf employees. Call them today for all your exterminating needs.

resp.text: Hi Steve, thank you so much for the 5-Star review! Dalton does a great job and is always thorough, professional, friendly, and helpful. We are thrilled to know that he helped you get your microwave up and running and took excellent care of you! Our technicians really do go above and beyond for our customers. We love knowing that you had an A+++ experience! From everyone at Bama we are sorry to hear that you had a stoke and please let us know if you ever need anything! We appreciate your business and the feedback!

name: Robin Maddox
text: I can always depend on Bama to remind me (nag if needed) of my regular service and add on mosquitoes in the summer. They take great care of us and have for a long time.

resp.text: Hi Robin! Thank you for sharing your experience with Bama Exterminating and our community. We are so happy to hear that you can depend on us. These kind words is what makes our job worth doing everyday.  I can't wait to share your feedback our team! We really do appreciate your business. Please don't hesitate to let us know if we can be of service. You are apart of the Bama Fam Jam. We are hear for you!

name: Jamie Lyn Morris Dockery
text: The technicians were personable, professional, and efficient. They treated my home with Termidor, which can be disruptive and messy since it requires drilling into concrete surfaces and getting next to exterior walls. However, they cleaned up after themselves, returned things they had to move, and were done in a little over an hour.

resp.text: Hi Jamie! Thank you for sharing your experience with Bama & our community. We are doing our best to make it super easy to have a termite & pest free home! These kind words mean a lot to us. This is what we strive for every day. I can't wait to share your feedback with our team. We really do appreciate your business! Please let us know if you ever need anything.

name: Judith Jackson
text: I have been with Bama Exterminating for years.  Scheduling my annual inspection is simple and always at my convenience.  The inspector is always courteous, knowledgeable and thorough.  I’m given opportunity to ask and have answered any questions and informed of the findings.  Highly recommend this local company !

resp.text: Hi Judith! Thank you for your awesome feedback!! We really do love helping people and I am glad it shows. Our only goal is to provide a safe pest & termite free home for our clients. I'll definitely share your feedback with the entire team! Thank you for being an awesome client of Bama Exterminating! We appreciate your business & we won't let you down!

name: aleeyah shree
text: The services were great & the customer service was phenomenal. Efren helped me get a better idea of how to stop pests from coming/staying in my home. I highly recommend Bama exterminating.

resp.text: Hi Aleeyah! Thank you for the 5 stars and sharing your experience with Bama Exterminating. Efren is one of the best pest techs around and I am so happy you enjoyed working with him. I can't wait to share your feedback with him and the team! We really do appreciate your business. Please don't hesitate to let us know if we can be of service.

name: Jimmy Perkins
text: The Technician was very knowledgeable and friendly. He gave me tips on what to do to keep the house protected. He sprayed, dusted, set out a few glue boards, and told me the  real problem areas to keep and eye on to prevent outside intruders. Overall, the service call was an A+ experience.

resp.text: Hi Jimmy! Thank you for sharing your experience with Bama Exterminating. Skye is one of the best pest guys around and I am so happy you enjoyed working with him. I can't wait to share your feedback with him and the team! We really do appreciate your business. Please don't hesitate to let us know if we can be of service.

name: Sean Mohabbat
text: Anna Beth was very attentive and professional on the phone. Joseph was cute.

resp.text: Hi Sean! Thank you for sharing your experience with Bama Exterminating and our community. I am so happy you enjoyed working with Anna Beth & Joseph. This brother and sister duo make a great team! I can't wait to share your feedback with them and the rest of the Bama Fam Jam! We really do appreciate your business. Please don't hesitate to let us know if we can be of service

name: Ragan Robinson
text: Bama is the best in town, without a doubt. Probably one of  the best in Alabama. Techs and manager are very knowledgeable. If you have a problem that needs to be solved quickly, they will be there ASAP! Unlike some companies, Bama Techs do a thorough inspection before deciding course of treatment. They SOLVE pest control problems, instead of just managing them. Next time I have any issues, I know who to call.

resp.text: Hi Regan! Thank you for the awesome recommendation! Our #1 goal is to make having a pest free home super easy. Our team really loves serving customers, and I am glad it shows through their knowledge and training! Thank you so much for trusting Bama Exterminating. We really do appreciate your business! We won't let you down!

name: Felicia Wallace
text: Bama exterminating was very professional and went above and beyond for me and family to help us get rid of bugs. I would definitely

resp.text: Hi Felicia! Thank you for sharing your experience with Bama & our community. We are doing our best to make it super easy to have a pest free home! These kind words mean a lot to us. This is what we strive for every day. I can't wait to share your feedback with our team. We really do appreciate your business! Please let us know if you ever need anything.

name: Alice Maxwell
text: I can’t say enough about my experience with Bama. Jake and Adam are SO professional! They always do a great job for my clients and myself! They’re a pleasure to work with!!

resp.text: Hi Alice! Thank you for sharing your experience with Bama Exterminating. No one tries any harder or loves what they do more than this group. I can't wait to share your feedback with Adam, Jake & the rest of the team! We really do appreciate your business. Please don't hesitate to let us know if we can be of service.*Make Your Home a Maxwell Home ;)

name: Brian James
text: Used them for a family friend and got the Bama Bundle. Can not beat a price of $275 for a Wood Infestation Report AND Termite Bond. AJ was very helpful in getting us scheduled and inspected in a timely manor. The inspector was thorough and was very helpful answering any questions that I had. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to start a termite bond in the Tuscaloosa/ Northport area.

resp.text: That's great to hear Brian! We agree, AJ is an awesome Customer Service Representative! Our only goal is to make having a pest & termite free home super easy on our clients. Fair Prices, Same Day Service, amazingly friendly staff, these are all the things we work our tails off for every single day. When you love what you do, it becomes easy to take awesome care of clients. Thank you so much for the awesome feedback and for being a great customer!

name: Tracey Howerton
text: Very helpful and  friendly.  Appointment made within a week..bug problem already improved with first treatment.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience Tracey! We are doing our best to make it super easy to have a pest free home! I can't wait to share your feedback with our team. We really do appreciate your business! Please let us know if you ever need anything.

text: This is a fantastic company that has the knowledge to treat any pest problem thrown their way. They are very punctual and offer appointments the next day. Would definitely call them again for any of my pest control needs.

name: Jessica Neill
text: Great customer service. Never had any issues with bugs since they began spraying. Also very affordable compared to others in the area.

resp.text: Hi Jessica! Thank you for the awesome review. We try our best to go above and beyond for each and every one of our customers & provide quality service at an affordable price. Please let us know if you ever need anything. Don't forget, If the bugs "bug" you, please "bug" us!

name: Andrew Stromer
text: We were very impressed with the service we received.   After analyzing the rodent droppings they were able to determine the critters that had been eating our pet Ceratopsians.  They were able to treat our Tyrannosaurus infestation and to this date we have not had any recurring issues.  We were especially impressed with our service tech Ashlie and would recommend her for any this kind Coelurosauria exterminations.

name: ANGIE MORRISON
text: Tonya has been amazing. Customer service is exceptional! Thank you Bama!

resp.text: Hi Angie! Thank you so much for sharing your experience with Bama Exterminating. We agree, Tonya is an awesome Customer Service Representative! She is our very own sweet, Southern Belle! I can't wait to share your feedback with her and our team. We really do appreciate your business! Let us know if you need anything! We won't let you down.

name: Brett Barton
text: Efren, the gentleman that came to service our house, was very nice and respectful. He answered all the questions I had and didn’t seem annoyed one bit. Efren had nothing but nice things to say about working for Bama Exterminating and how they take care of him. Regardless of the service provided (which was very good) people like Efren make you realize there still are great people out there.

resp.text: Thank you Brett for your feedback! Efren is a beautiful person inside and out. We are blessed to have him in of our Bama Family! He is very knowledgeable and a great technician and Supervisor. We are so glad he took good care of you! Thank you for the 5 stars! We truly appreciate you as a customer. Let us know if you need anything.

name: Gene Raburn
text:
Blake Johnson performed our service.  As always he called prior to arrival and was super cordial and respectful.  I had to leave home before he finished but was perfectly comfortable knowing he would do a great job.  Thank you, Blake.
Gene Raburn,  Greystone

resp.text: Wow that's great to hear Gene!  We agree, Blake is an awesome pest specialist! Our only goal is to make having a pest free home super easy on our clients. Fair Prices, Same Day Service, amazingly friendly staff, these are all the things we work our tails off for every single day. When you love what you do, it becomes easy to take care of awesome clients. Thank you so much for the awesome feedback and for being a great customer!

name: Courtney Ashcraft
text: The tech was on time ,  called ahead to let me know he was on the way, did a thorough job , very knowledgeable and explained some other services Bama provided.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience Courtney! I can't wait to share your feedback with the team. We really do appreciate your business!

name: Milton Milling
text:
It would be nice if they would call me to let me know when they were coming to do the services.
I have dogs and need to get them put up before they get there and open my gate and let them out.
Updated
Today I received a call from someone about my review and the concerns that I have.
They are supposed to call and set up my appointment in the future.

resp.text:
Hello Milton, we apologize for the experience you had with on of our team members. We strive to always provide our customers with prompt and professional service. This is not typical of us and can assure you it will not happen again.

We want you to know that we've used your experience within our customer satisfaction process to be sure we don't make this mistake again.

We’ll be reaching out to you personally in the next 24 hours to touch bases. We want to learn more about what happened and how we can make things right.

Rachel Hunter
Marketing & Business Development
Bama Exterminating

name: CB Smith
text: My family is always satisfied with the service from Bama Exterminating, a locally-owned company that aims to please its customers. The technicians are friendly and attentive to our specific pest control needs both indoors & outdoors. I highly recommend Bama Exterminating & have been a customer for over a decade.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your great experience with Bama Exterminating. Our #1 goal is to make having a pest free home super easy! This team loves to serve and I am so glad it shows. We really do appreciate your business!

name: Daisy Frith
text: Have been really pleased with this company. Their customer service is excellent and super nice people to work with!

resp.text: We love getting this feedback - thank you so much Daisy! We're so happy we were able to assist you and look forward to serving you again in the future!

name: Marian Watts
text:
This year, more than ever our mosquito service from Bama Exterminating is a value for our family as we are spending a lot of time at home in our backyard. We have two young boys who spend a lot of time outside. It nice to not worry about putting bug repellent on them every time they go out to play.
Our technician Justin is always professional and answers any questions and concerns that we may have. We have been Bama customers for years and have recommended their services to other family and friends.

resp.text: We love getting this feedback - thank you so much Marian! We're so happy we were able to assist you and look forward to serving you again in the future!

name: Rachel Averette
text: Very responsive and quick when coming to do the service. Would definitely recommend to friends and family. Also, they aren’t over priced like some exterminator companies in this area... which is a plus!

resp.text: We believe that quality service shouldn't empty your pockets. We appreciate the 5 stars and recommendation. Thank you so much Rachel!

name: Steve Sandlin
text:
We have used Bama Exterminating for over 10 years in our game day house in Tuscaloosa. They are very trustworthy since they spray our home when we aren’t home 100% of the time. We haven’t had to worry about pests since we started using them. No
pests No problems No worries with Bama

resp.text: Hi Steve! Thank you so much for sharing your great experience with Bama Exterminating. Our #1 goal is to make having a pest free home super easy! This team loves to serve and I am so glad it shows. We really do appreciate your business! Roll Tide!

name: Consuela Colburn
text: I inherited your services from purchasing a house you had already bonded and I have been very pleased with the help understand of the few I have talked with and meet. You have already been a big help and don't really know it.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. Colburn! We are so happy to hear that we have been a great help. We are always a phone call away if you need anything at all or have any questions. We appreciate your business and we're truly blessed you got inherited into the Bama Family!

name: Bobbie Howard
text: Great team, very knowledgeable, on time, took correct safety precautions and were very thorough.

resp.text: Hi Bobbie, Thank you so much for this review. We are really proud of this review and we are grateful that you took the time for this review. Please let us know if you have any needs or require any services. Thank you so much for letting Bama Exterminating service your home.

name: RTS
text: Have termite bond with them. Got billed for service but had to remind them service was never conducted this year. Service was expedited! Usually they call me to set up service.

resp.text:
Hello RT Sims,

Thank you so much for taking the time to write to us.
We make it a point to be known for customer service, so this situation caught us a little off guard.

We would like the opportunity to investigate your feedback further. Please could you call our team at 205.344.9311? We’ll work with you to resolve any issues as quickly as possible.”

Thank you so much, and I look forward to hearing from you!

name: Nathan Winkles
text: Very professional and great quality. If bugs come back before there next appointment then they promptly come back out to spray again at no charge!

resp.text: That's right Nathan, we'll come back in between visits if you're still having any issues! We really do appreciate the great feedback & thank you for your business!

name: John Lang
text: I have only had outstanding experiences with Bama Exterminating. A few years ago we had an issue that required skill and professionalism. Bama sent out a team and eradicated the problem - and ever since has kept watch over our house faithfully. Thank you Bama.

resp.text: Hi John! Thank you for sharing your experience with the team at Bama. Our only goal is to make having a pest-free home super easy. This group really does love helping people and killing bugs. I'm super glad it shows! We appreciate your business and don't take your trust for granted!

name: Fredric H
text: Very professional showed up on time. Very through inside and out.

resp.text: Hi Fredric! Thank you for sharing your experience with Bama Exterminating. No one tries any harder or loves what they do more than this group. I can't wait to share your feedback with the team! We really do appreciate your business. Please don't hesitate to let us know if we can be of service.

name: Michael Baltins
text: Consistent and always on time.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience Michael! We are doing our best to make it super easy to have a pest free home! I can't wait to share your feedback with our team. We really do appreciate your business! Please let us know if you ever need anything.

text: Awesome service! On time and very professional! Took care of our problem completely! Would recommend to anyone! Tyler did a great job!

text: I have always been super impressed by the courtesy and professional attitude of all contacts with the employees during our termite Bond inspections for the past 16 years! Great follow up and reminders from the administrative office employees for appointment, payments and scheduling!

name: susancdewey
text: Wow! Bama Exterminating is absolutely outstanding. My husband and I bought our Alabama home sight-unseen and Bama Exterminating went above and beyond in conducting a thorough inspection that really set our minds at ease. Jake took the time to call us after the inspection and answer our questions in an extremely thoughtful and kind manner. I highly recommend Jake and Bama Exterminating to anyone seeking home inspections or extermination services.

text: The two men who came wore their masks and observed all the Covid safety rules. They were on time, very courteous, and professional. We were impressed with their thoroughness. Took their time and checked out each Centricon . One man came in after asking us if we wanted inside checked. He was exceptionally through and very detailed in his inspection. We have been with Bama Exterminating Co. for 3 years, when we bought this house. Very pleased.

resp.text: Thank you Johnnye for the kind words and 5 stars! This kind of feedback is why we get up every morning and do what we do with love and compassion! Thank you so much for your business! We are so proud to be able to take care of your home.

text: Bama Exterminating went beyond what we expected. We were buying our house sight-unseen and Jake took the time to call us and go over the inspection in detail to put our minds at ease. We will be using them in the future for our termite control needs and will recommend them in the future to our friends.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 stars & this wonderful feedback! We value your service and look forward to seeing you again in the future!

name: Easther Lawrence
text: Bama Exterminating does not return phones calls. It appears Bama Exterminating does not need or want new business or customers. I can not recommend a business that does not return phones when I’m attempting to become a new customer. If Bama won’t communicate with a potential new customer one might only imagine how Bama treats existing customers. In this day and age of high uncertainty as to whether a business will remain in business one would hope for a returned phone call. Maybe Bama Exterminating has all the business it needs?

resp.text: Hello Easther, we are so sorry for this negative experience you have had. We strive to always provide our customers with prompt and professional service. If there is anything we can do to remedy this situation - please give us a call at your earliest convenience.

name: Jesse Wells
text: Professional service with a smile, couldn't be happier with the outcome. The techs were very knowledgeable and explained everything I needed to know about the treatment in great detail. Would highly recommend to anyone in need of an exterminator or routine service.

text: Reg tech out sick on appt date, but Bama pulled another to get my quarterly service done when due.  Tech was courteous and followed Covid safety protocols.  Have used Bama for our pest control and termite bond.

Thank you for your business, you have been with us since 2014! You are definitely apart of the Bama Fam Jam. Take care & we will see you soon. Call us if you need anything.

text: I was very pleased with the service from Efren Sanson and Justin Jemison today. Efren did A terrific job with training and I was even more impressed with how fast Justin caught on. Efren took the time to explain to me what steps I needed to take and what to look for when I would be doing my own apartment checks. Thanks guys for your services.

resp.text: Thank you Felicia. Glad to know ours guys took good care of you!

text: I don't know what they spray for but I trust  I won't get critters...

name: Shequita Wilkerson
text: The absolute worst company you can hire.. Will charge you for service they never rendered..I'll  advise anyone to look elsewhere.. Office staff very rude and unprofessional.

text: This company is great from the Top to the Bottom! My clients are always pleased with the results of using BAMA

resp.text: Thank you so much Ian! We are so thankful to have you as a customer and we greatly appreciate your business from the Top to the Bottom ;)

name: ann payne
text: I have been using Bama for many years. They are the best. Thanks

resp.text: Amy, we appreciate your business! Thank you for being a valued customer at Bama. We look forward to serving you many more years to come!

name: Carol Lee
text: We signed up for quarterly pest control because the house already had an existing termite contract with them. After the first spray, we kept getting earwigs (like 1 a day) inside the house (half of the time they were very much alive). We called and they sprayed again. It didn't stop the earwigs. Second spraying comes around and same thing- earwigs inside every day. This time when we contacted them (2 weeks ago), they ignored us. They also didn't call when they came to spray the second time so if hadn't been home, he wouldn't have been able to get inside or in the backyard. We signed a year contract and I'm not sure what it would take to get out of that. But signing a contract should have been a signal they were bad. Good results don't require a contract to keep people stuck. Be aware of the contact too- it only covers a very limited amount of pests.

resp.text: Hello Carol, We are so sorry for your negative experience. We strive to give all of our customers a 5-star treatment with positive results. Please give us a call at (205) 344-9311 so we can work towards a solution together.

name: robben Hewitt
text: Excellent work, very professional went beyond when we asked if they would spray the inside of our homes also!

name: Judy Riley
text: We have been satisfied Bama Exterminating customers for about 24 years.  We recently moved and Bama moved with us.  They have always taken care of our needs and their quality of service is great.  Courteous, professionals to deal with, too.

name: LP
text: Bama Exterminating handles the pest control at our building.  Their staff is always professional and courteous, and very knowledgeable.  The customer service here is the BEST!

name: Brandi Todd
text: The Woodlands has loved using Bama Exterminating. They are fast, reliable, and professional. The staff is very friendly and attentive to all of our tenants needs.They're certainly the best at what they do!

name: Christy Heaps
text: I've used Bama for years and really appreciate their service.  The customer service, email confirmations and technicians are great!  I highly recommend Bama.

name: Jim Bailey
text: Pleasant people who know what they are doing and are consistently on time. While I have never used them for anything except termite treatments, I have never had any infestation issues. I have confidence that if a problem arose they would handle it effectively.

name: Brittany Clayton
text: Quick to come out and handle any issues in between regular services.

name: Catherine Lee
text: My roommate and I had a terrible experience with this company. To start, the employee sprayed the wrong house the first time we made an appointment. This was very inconvenient for my roommate and I to figure out another time to have the guy come spray our house. Once we got home after finally having our house sprayed, we noticed some of our belongings had been gone through. There was jewelry rearranged, purses opened, and a ring was lying in the hallway by the kitchen. We were very confused because the only person who had been in our house that day was the exterminator. We looked through our belongings and came to find that a Michael Kors watch was missing (est. $225), Apple T.V (est. $100+),  jewelry (est. $600+), and cash. We are not explicitly accusing anyone of stealing, but we have high suspicions because the exterminator was the only one in the house that day. Keep in mind that it was required for everyone in the house to evacuate during the spraying procedure. We are extremely violated and hope this does not happen to anyone else.

name: Jennifer Lauth
text: My company has used their services for years. We love the great managerial staff, and the technicians we've had have always been willing to work with us and our tenants. I'd suggest them to anyone!

name: Kevin Foote
text: Bama Exterminating is the best pest control in town, hands down. They're organized enough to handle a heavy workload, but small enough to focus on their customers & provide great service. Good people at Bama. Would recommend them to my own mother!

name: Jeanette Haley
text: My experience with Bama has been very good.  The people sent to our home have been prompt, professional, courteous and helpful.  We have been pleased with the service.

name: Pam Sewell
text:
We have used Bama for about 15 years (in 3 different houses).  Nice techs that come to my house. Have rarely seen a live "bug" inside the house - but if I do and it's not time for the next quarterly service, I call them and they come out and re-spray at no charge.
We recently moved (about 4 months ago) and, though, still in a neighborhood, this time our house backs up to woods instead of a neighbor's house.  We had ticks and "critters" in the yard everywhere! - some I had never seen before in my life! Carly came and did a TOTAL inside and outside spray (the entire yard!) before we started the quarterly service at this house.  Bugs and ticks are GONE! Wheee!  I still see an occasional 'millipede' (sp?) but I think as we continue the quarterly service, they will disappear too (they are rough ole hard-shelled critters!). 4 Thumbs Up! ;-)

name: Alex Seiver
text: I had an absolutely fantastic experience with Bama Exterminating Co. - the team that came do perform the termite protection on my home were punctual, friendly, courteous, professional, and above all, did a great job! I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Bama Exterminating to anyone looking for pest and termite protection.

name: Britt Marshall
text: Have been using their services for many years.  Have always been extremely happy with their thoroughness, their hospitality and their professionalism.  If you are in need of termite bond or pest control services, you should use them.

name: Delmar Thomas
text:
I had Bama Exterminating for a few years until I ran into some problems with them being sloppy.  I live out of state, but used them for my second home in AL.  I specifically asked them from the beginning to put my primary out-of-state home address as the billing contact.  For years, they would conduct the service and send the bill to my primary address out of state.  I always immediately paid for their services via credit card over the phone.  For my annual ant and terminate inspections this year, I just happen to call them to schedule things, and they said, "we closed your account because of failure to make a payment."  ???  I told them I never received a bill nor knew there was an outstanding balance.  I asked what the billing address was...never got a straight answer.  Eventually, the phone representative admitted to the possibility that Bama may have sent it to the AL home where the service was being performed.  Also not true, because my mom lives there and sends me all bills that come to the house.  The phone rep even had the nerve to say "we were sending the account to collections."  I never even knew there was a bill due!  And they obviously make no attempts on their end to keep in touch with the customer.  That was issue No. 1.  Nonetheless, I immediately paid the outstanding balance and that issue was resolved, despite Bama's sloppiness and failure to communicate.

Issue No 2., they have an absolutely unconscionable provision in their agreement that says something to the effect of, "Customer must give 30 days written notice before getting out the the Agreement."  The very next sentence in the Agreement says, "Bama may cancel the contact without notice at any time for any reason."  What?!

Besides the fact that such a provision would never hold up in court if there ever were a dispute, it is a completely onerous clause.  They're not selling gold, they spraying chemicals on the ground, for goodness sake.  No need for such an unfair clause.  I asked the representative for a reason for such an unfair clause.  She responded something to the effect of, "we need that in there for customers who don't pay."  What????  Well, in my opinion, such language is waaaay over broad for such a limited scenario as nonpayment.  Anyway, I refused to agree to it, Bama Exterminating refused to change or delete it, and we parted ways.  I signed up the same day with their competitor, who actually ended up being cheaper...and more organized as well.  I have been happy so far.

There is a fine line between a mom and pop operation and a sloppy operation.

name: leslie crawford
text: Wont use bama exterminators again. They are liars. Say one thing and do another.

resp.text: Hello Leslie, we are so sorry you have had a negative experience with us. We aim to provide superior pest control services to our clients and to always be upfront about all aspects of our business and services. To ensure we are maintaining this level of superior service we keep very detailed records of all interactions with our team. We will review your account and reach out to you if any additional information is needed to resolve this matter. Please feel free to call us anytime you have questions.

name: Amber Victoria Cicero
text: 10/10 recommend!

resp.text: WOW! 5 stars and a 10/10! We can't thank you enough Amber! We value your service and look forward to seeing you again in the future!

name: Parminder Pruthi
text: We had roachs problem. Three different companies we tried, no one could solve the problem. Then my friend told me that he had the same problem and advised to hire Bama exterminator. Finally Bama exterminator eliminated the problem.

name: Tyler Gregory
text: Great experience with Bama! They are second to no one in the business

name: Amy Nichols
text: We've owned two homes in Northport and Bama has serviced both so well! Our first home had a crawl space and we inherited a major pest issue from the previous homeowners. Bama got us fixed up! In our newer home, on a slab, we thought we could go without pest control, but learned quickly that if you don't do SOMEthing to prevent them, those little brown yuckthings WILL come in your home. No matter how clean you are. So we called Bama back and have been satisfied (and bug-free) customers ever since!

name: Brandi Stacey
text: We could not be more pleased with Bama Exterminating. All of the employees are kind, helpful, and professional.

name: Matt Fulghum
text: Courteous and professional, not to mention prompt.  Service was excellent.

name: Dr. Lindsay Greenlee
text:
This company is unprofessional and their customer service is severely lacking.  In my case, they made several mistakes and refused to admit to or even rectify their own mistakes.  I purchased my home four years ago and it came with a termite bond with Bama Exterminating.  This year (2014) they mailed me a contract to sign regarding that termite bond with dates listed from 2012 to 2014.  In essence, because they made a mistake and did not have me sign a contract when I purchased the home, they were trying to get me to agree to terms for the previous years to cover themselves legally while disregarding the legal issues for the customer.
I called their office manager, Kim Ousley, to inquire about this contract and she was unable to explain why I was receiving this contract four years after the home purchase and why the contract had a start date listed as 2012.  After getting frustrated with my questioning and being unable to answer the questions posed to her, she hung up the phone.
Then, I spoke with another employee, Mr. Bridges, who did manage to explain at least why I was receiving this contract at the time I did.  However, he did not see any issue with me agreeing to terms, in writing, that were two years in the past.  He also did not see any issue with Ms. Ousley's behavior even though she was unable to explain their contract and hung up on a customer after getting flustered.
So, there are a serious of problems here that are all the mistake of Bama Exterminating and the company refused to rectify their mistake.  First, they should obtain a new contract when homes are sold for the new owner.  They failed to do that in my case.  When they realized their mistake (in 2012), they continued to let the contract go unsigned.  In 2014, they mailed a letter and a contract dated for 2012.  In the letter they stated they could not renew my termite bond UNLESS I signed the back-dated contract.  This seems reasonable except the mistake was on their end and I shouldn't be required to sign things I am uncomfortable signing and they refused to fix it.  I offered to sign a current contract but they would not do that unless I signed the back-dated one.  Finally, the way the office manager, Ms. Ousley, handled the call was unfortunate.  If she did not have the proper information or could not communicate effectively with the customer, she should have found someone else to help rather than hang up the phone on a long-term customer.
In sum, there were multiple errors made this company and even after I offered to sign a current contract, they refused to fix their mistake or even take responsibility.  I would not recommend doing business with this company until they refine their business practices.  There are many more companies that offer the same type of services and will offer better customer service.

***Update - I hired their competitor for half the cost yearly and I would suggest doing that.  From what I have learned about pest control, Bama Exterminating is using older bait stations which is why they need to come service them four times a year.  Companies that use more modern equipment are lower cost because the stations need to be serviced less often.

name: S Little
text: Not very nice people, really rude and short each time I have called.  Definitely won't be using them again in the future.

name: Tara Scogin
text: Great business!

resp.text: Thank you for the compliment Tara!

name: Jill Beam
text: Love them! Great customer service!

name: Joseph Grogan
text: Love them!!!

resp.text: Thank you Joe! Bama Home are the Best Homes!

name: Vince Wyatt
text: That was a year ago

resp.text: Thank you Vince for the 5 stars!!

name: Ed The Man McBride
text: ADEM is a great place to work. 29 years and counting!

name: Ed The Man McBride
text:
Great place to work!
Protecting Alabama's environment since 1982

name: Frank Tipton
text:
Easy to find, quick to get you in an out.
Could take a little time to fill the very large pot holes and trim the paint scratching limbs when pulling in.

name: daniel Travis
text: I truly believe they go out of their way to make it difficult for you to load

name: Acy Wilson
text: What can you say they do what they do real well.

name: Tiffany Hamilton
text: slow loading

name: kerri lucido
text: Thank you, thank you Montgomery Sanitation Department. Rain, sleet, hail or snow,  you are working hard to keep our city clean and the ladies in the office are so kind and courteous. I’m always happy to see the guys coming to pick up my garbage with smiles and waves. 👋👋👋

name: David SL
text: The group of people that work here are absolutely amazing wonderful and kind.

name: Kim Lewis
text: Just came through Halcyon Forest Trail. Did a great job cleaning everything up.  Thanks for the hard work.

name: Clowwyf 09
text: Couldn't put a zero because that's what it deserves my whole neighborhood has their tree limbs that they put on the curb still there. Mine I know personally has been there 3 weeks soon to be 4 but yet I pay for sanitation. They dump the trash cans but the other services that they suppose to provide they neglect.

name: silas bonner
text: Have a great sanitation department. When I call they would not tell me the director was not in the office. But the director is a very fine person and will see to it that's handled

name: Kiara
text: Horrible customer service! Horrible communication !

name: Jerry Hunter
text:
Pull my trash can twice over a rental house water bill overdue. But never pull can at rental hous . Failed to reinstate and pull can 6 weeks after bill was paid. Told me it would take 3 to 5 days to return can that they weren't supposed to pull in the first place.. told me that their system didnt account for reinstate account.
And let's not talk about missed pickups and reaching in and taking plastic bags out of ca . Judt lazy and triflin . Oh and to top it off??? Driver blasted pass the only stop sign in the neighborhood like it wasnt ther . When I call about it the dumb CS person asked did I get the truck numbe .

name: Carla Clayborn
text: Give out account information to neighbors that’s not on your account, and bad customer service zero stars if possible

name: Ben Armer
text: Montgomery sanitation department is so slow to respond to pick up request but god have mercy they will charge quick as HELLo   This is Trully one of the worst cities to ever live in.

name: Kenyatta Havenott
text: Worst please in the world

name: Robbie Johnson-Palmer
text: Pays our bills...kmsl😘😘

text: MY LIVELIHOOD MY JOB
